mapper.select: SELECT data FROM plunder_data WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT od_user_id AS userId, JSON_EXTRACT(data, '$.level') AS level, JSON_EXTRACT(data, '$.silver') AS silver, JSON_EXTRACT(data, '$.wood') AS wood, JSON_EXTRACT(data, '$.paper') AS paper, JSON_EXTRACT(data, '$.food') AS food, JSON_EXTRACT(data, '$.rank') AS rank FROM user_resource
